metadata.title: CVE-2016-4793 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The clientIp function in CakePHP 3.2.4 and earlier allows remote attackersto spoof their IP via the CLIENT-IP HTTP header.

criterions.comment: cakephp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
